GlobalChangeSpec.Name: Add Transaction Funder Manager Metrics Attribute
GlobalChangeSpec.Description: Add Transaction Funder Manager Metrics Attribute
GlobalChangeSpec.Author: HEIFERNET\khamling
GlobalChangeSpec.DisplayName: Add Transaction Funder Manager Metrics Attribute
GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_ADDTRANSACTIONFUNDERMGRMETRICSATTR ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @REVENUESELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime declare @PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE datetime declare @MGRNAME nvarchar(100) declare @CONSTID uniqueidentifier set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0; set @MGRNAME=''; set @CONSTID = null;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate DECLARE @REVENUESELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @REVENUESELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@REVENUESELECTIONID)
--DELETE attribute values before starting. Necessary values will be repopulated --delete from --Dev --ATTRIBUTEEDCD353A215542519EA1ED3CAD36E74A --Prod -- ATTRIBUTE66F5A52580454472A915189B2BEBD214 --where id in (select id from @REVENUESELECTION)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), REVENUEID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
declare @DAYS int = 0 declare @INTERACTIONS int = 0 declare @OPPORTUNITIES int = 0
insert into @T --select top 200 ID select ID from @REVENUESELECTION SelectionResults
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @REVENUEID uniqueidentifier
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE (This loop is for the Constituent that owns the revenue) while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @REVENUEID = REVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
/* select top 1 @MGRNAME = isnull([V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER].[NAME],'') from [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_PROSPECT].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] on [V_QUERY_PROSPECT].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER].[ID] where [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] in (select constituentid from financialtransaction where id = @REVENUEID) */
set @MGRNAME = ''
select top 1 @MGRNAME = isnull([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[NAME],''), --@CONSTID = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].id, @DAYS = datediff(d,convert(date,[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE]),[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] ), @PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[CONSTITUENTID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[ID] where v_query_revenue.id = @REVENUEID and isnull([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[NAME],'') <> ''
select @INTERACTIONS = count( [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[ID] ) --DATEADD(day,-7,[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]), --[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[AMOUNT] as [Amount], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] as [Date], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[ID] as [Constituent\Interactions\System record ID], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[LOOKUPID] as [Constituent\Interactions\Interaction lookup ID], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions\Owner].[NAME] as [Constituent\Interactions\Owner\Name], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[NAME] as [Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager\Name], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] as [Constituent\Interactions\Date], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[BASECURRENCYID] as [Base currency ID], --[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] as [QUERYRECID] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[CONSTITUENTID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_INTERACTION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[CONSTITUENTID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions\Owner] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[OWNERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions\Owner].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE].id = @REVENUEID --and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent].id = @CONSTID and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions\Owner].[NAME] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[NAME] and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] >= DATEADD(day,-365,[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]) --and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] < DATEADD(day,-7,[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]) and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] <= [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]
select @OPPORTUNITIES = count([V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY].[OPPORTUNITYID] ) from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY] on [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].revenueid=@REVENUEID
-- KHAMLING changed to @INTERACTIONS>1 on 4/18/17 per Ted if @MGRNAME <> '' and ( ((@DAYS >= 14 or @PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE is null) and @INTERACTIONS > 1) OR (@OPPORTUNITIES > 0) ) begin begin try --Dev --insert into ATTRIBUTEEDCD353A215542519EA1ED3CAD36E74A --Prod insert into ATTRIBUTE66F5A52580454472A915189B2BEBD214 ( id, value, addedbyid, dateadded, changedbyid, datechanged ) values ( @REVENUEID, @MGRNAME, @CHANGEAGENTID, getdate(), @CHANGEAGENTID, getdate() ) set @NUMBERADDED = @NUMBERADDED + @@ROWCOUNT end try begin catch --do nothing (do not overwrite) /* begin try --Dev --update ATTRIBUTEEDCD353A215542519EA1ED3CAD36E74A --Prod update ATTRIBUTE66F5A52580454472A915189B2BEBD214 set value = @MGRNAME, changedbyid = @CHANGEAGENTID, datechanged = getdate() where id=@REVENUEID set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT; end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch */ end catch end
set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE (This loop is for the Constituent that owns the revenue)
-- initialize variables for 2nd loop set @I = 1 set @DAYS = 0 set @INTERACTIONS = 0 set @OPPORTUNITIES = 0 set @MGRNAME = '' set @CONSTID = null
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE (This loop is for the Constituent that owns the revenue recognition on the revenue record) while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @REVENUEID = REVENUEID from @T where PK = @I
/* select top 1 @MGRNAME = isnull([V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER].[NAME],'') from [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] on [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_PROSPECT].[ID] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] on [V_QUERY_PROSPECT].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER].[ID] where [V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT].[ID] in --(select constituentid from financialtransaction where id = @REVENUEID) ( select usr_v_query_revenuerecognitionheifer.constituentid from usr_v_query_revenuerecognitionheifer inner join v_query_revenuesplit on usr_v_query_revenuerecognitionheifer.revenuesplitid = v_query_revenuesplit.id inner join financialtransaction on v_query_revenuesplit.revenueid = financialtransaction.id where financialtransaction.id = @REVENUEID ) and isnull([V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER].[NAME],'') <> '' */
select @MGRNAME = ''
select top 1 @CONSTID = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].id, @MGRNAME = isnull([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].name,''), @DAYS = datediff(d,convert(date,[V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE]),[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE] ), @PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE] from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUERECOGNITIONHEIFER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer].[REVENUESPLITID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer].[CONSTITUENTID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[ID] where v_query_revenue.id = @REVENUEID and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].id <> v_query_revenue.constituentid and isnull([V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].name,'') <> ''
select @INTERACTIONS = count( [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions].[ID] ) from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUE] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[REVENUEID] inner join [dbo].[USR_V_QUERY_REVENUERECOGNITIONHEIFER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer].[REVENUESPLITID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer].[CONSTITUENTID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_INTERACTION] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions].[CONSTITUENTID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions\Owner] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions].[OWNERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions\Owner].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_PROSPECT] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[ID] inner join [dbo].[V_QUERY_FUNDRAISER] as [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager] on [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect].[PROSPECTMANAGERFUNDRAISERID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUE].id = @REVENUEID and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent].id = @CONSTID and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions\Owner].[NAME] = [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Prospect\Prospect Manager].[NAME] and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] >= DATEADD(day,-365,[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]) --and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] < DATEADD(day,-7,[V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]) and [V_QUERY_REVENUE\Revenue Splits\Revenue Recognition Credits- Heifer\Constituent\Interactions].[DATE] <= [V_QUERY_REVENUE].[DATE]
select @OPPORTUNITIES = count([V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY].[OPPORTUNITYID] ) from [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT] left outer join [dbo].[V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY] on [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].[ID] = [V_QUERY_REVENUEOPPORTUNITY].[ID] where [V_QUERY_REVENUESPLIT].revenueid=@REVENUEID
-- KHAMLING changed to @INTERACTIONS>1 on 4/18/17 per Ted if @MGRNAME <> '' and ( ((@DAYS >= 14 or @PROSPECTMANAGERSTARTDATE is null) and @INTERACTIONS > 1) OR (@OPPORTUNITIES > 0) ) begin begin try --Dev --insert into ATTRIBUTEEDCD353A215542519EA1ED3CAD36E74A --Prod insert into ATTRIBUTE66F5A52580454472A915189B2BEBD214 ( id, value, addedbyid, dateadded, changedbyid, datechanged ) values ( @REVENUEID, @MGRNAME, @CHANGEAGENTID, getdate(), @CHANGEAGENTID, getdate() ) set @NUMBERADDED = @NUMBERADDED + @@ROWCOUNT end try begin catch --do nothing (do not overwrite) /* begin try --Dev --update ATTRIBUTEEDCD353A215542519EA1ED3CAD36E74A --Prod update ATTRIBUTE66F5A52580454472A915189B2BEBD214 set value = @MGRNAME, changedbyid = @CHANGEAGENTID, datechanged = getdate() where id=@REVENUEID set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT; end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR; return 1; end catch */ end catch end set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE (This loop is for the Constituent that owns the revenue recognition on the revenue record)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
